latex:
If the three points of contact of a circle inscribed in a triangle are joined, the angles of the resulting triangle:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{are always equal to }60^\circ \\
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{are always one obtuse angle and two unequal acute angles} \\
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{are always one obtuse angle and two equal acute angles} \\
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{are always acute angles} \\
\textbf{(E)}\  \text{are always unequal to each other}$
